title: report
body: i was in game with anivia and all team enemy (all premade) flame me and write in chat global " report all anivia pls " don't is sportive this... is normal for you? i have write noob but riot ban me for this? i don't think

replies.body: Why you created 3 thread, in our Italian EUW forum, about this??
Hi AppleWeb, this is the italian board, so I kindly ask you to use italian language here. If you prefer to speak english, please use the international board.
